name: Conflagrow
description:
Let the World Burn!!

Help the Forest Fire Grow!! Arrange the items so as to help the fire grow and bring our miserable world to an end.
Resources.. decreasing and population increasing. Soon the world will have nothing but rocks. And as a wise man once said.
"Burn Them ALL!!" :).

There is a Fire at one end of the Level and all the burnable bush scattered around the map. Fire always grows in four directions.
With the help of resources provided, arrange the map so as to help the fire burn all the burnable grasslands
